location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Neil Benjamin Edmonstone, Secretary in the Secret, Political and Foreign Department, Fort William, Calcutta

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing an extract from a communication from Owaness Paitkhym dated 30 October 1807. The content of the extract includes information on French diplomatic activity at the Persian Court and the movements of the Turkish army under Yusuf Pachah following its defeat at the hands of the Russians near Gurz.
